name: Coffee Run (itch) (zzverot)
description:
THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS COMPLETELEY BROKEN!!!

IN WORKED on my computer but when i posted it on itch.io it broke so ill add a download for the game called coffeeJam_full.exe

I made this for https://itch.io/jam/coffee-jam #CoffeeJam . This is also my fist game jam
